com.github.p4535992.database.util

Class FileUtilities.FileWalker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.p4535992.database.util.FileUtilities.FileWalker
  • Enclosing class:
    FileUtilities

    public static class FileUtilities.FileWalker
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for a depth first traversal of a file-system starting from a given node (file or directory). e.g. FileWalker.Handler handler = new FileWalker.Handler() { Override public void file(File file) throws Exception { statementsLoaded.addAndGet( loadFileChunked(file) ); } Override public void directory(File directory) throws Exception { log("Loading files from: " + directory.getAbsolutePath()); } }; FileWalker walker = new FileWalker(); walker.setHandler(handler); walker.walk(new File(preload));

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FileUtilities.FileWalker.Handler
      The call back interface for traversal.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setHandler(FileUtilities.FileWalker.Handler handler)
      Set the notification handler.
      void walk(java.io.File node)
      Start the walk at the given location, which can be a file, for a very short walk, or a directory which will be traversed recursively.

        public void setHandler(FileUtilities.FileWalker.Handler handler)

      • walk

        public void walk(java.io.File node)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Start the walk at the given location, which can be a file, for a very short walk, or a directory which will be traversed recursively.
        Parameters:
        node - The starting point for the walk.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - error during the search.
